alert.note: Alert for Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clarendon and southeastern Orangeburg Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bowman, or 12 miles northwest of Saint George, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holly Hill, Branchville, Bowman, Santee, Eutawville, Rowesville, Vance, Eautaw Springs, Indian Bluff Recreation Park, Yonder Field, and Mill Creek Marina and Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 157 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
